name: Jobe Armor Tier 1

items.alias: First Tier Adventurer Jobe Suit Body

raw: ------------------------------Ingredients< ------------------------------ a part of Jobe Armor ( #L "see here" "/tell recipe 542" ) #L "Consanguineal Embryo of Annwn" "239835" #L "Canister Of Pure Liquid Notum" "223446" a special Novictum ( ie : #L "Novictum Mud" "218472" ) Vision x 3 ( ie #L "Visions of The Reposeful " "239466" ) ------------------------------ First ------------------------------ Go to jobe and give the Consanguineal Embryo of Annwn and the Three Visions to your Profession IPS, he will give you a Yellow Glyph: Example: #L "Yellow Glyph of Aban" "218339" ). ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Canister Of Pure Liquid Notum + Yellow Glyph = Yellow Glyph - Awakened ( ie #L "Yellow Glyph of Aban - Awakened" "227624" ) Skills: | QP | ------------------------------ Novictum + Yellow Glyph - Awakened = Glyph ( ie #L "Glyph of the One" "227758" ) Skills: | PS | ------------------------------ Glyph + a part of Jobe Armor = a part of Jobe Tier 1 Armor ( ie #L "First Tier Adventurer Jobe Suit Body" "213446" ) Skills: | PS | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ Adventurer: #L "Visions of The Reposeful" "239466" #L "Novictum Mud" "218472" ------------------------------ Agent: #L "Visions of the Tempestuous" "239467" #L "Transparent Novictum Gas" "218468" ------------------------------ Bureaucrat: #L "Visions of the Tempestuous" "239467" #L "Radiant Novictum Gas" "218469" ------------------------------ Doctor: #L "Visions of The Reposeful" "239466" #L "Pure Novictum Liquid" "218470" ------------------------------ Enforcer: #L "Visions of the Unshakable" "239468" #L "Compact Novictum Stone" "218473" ------------------------------ Engineer: #L "Visions of the Unshakable" "239468" #L "Crystalized Novictum" "218480" ------------------------------ Fixer: #L "Visions of The Reposeful" "239466" #L "Mist of Novictum" "218477" ------------------------------ Keeper: #L "Visions of the Unshakable" "239468" #L "Spongy Novictum" "218474" ------------------------------ Martial Artist: #L "Visions of the Unshakable" "239468" #L "Novictum Sand" "218478" ------------------------------ Meta Physicist: #L "Visions of The Reposeful" "239466" #L "Plastic Novictum""218475" ------------------------------ Nano Technician: #L "Visions of the Tempestuous" "239467" #L "Caustic Novictum" "218476" ------------------------------ Shade: #L "Visions of the Unshakable" "239468" #L "Carbonized Novictum Stone" "218471" ------------------------------ Soldier: #L "Visions of the Tempestuous" "239467" #L "Porous Novictum Stone" "218479" ------------------------------ Trader: #L "Visions of The Reposeful" "239466" #L "Fragmented Novictum Crystal" "218467" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Tier one is complete ... move on to #L "Tier 2" "/tell recipe 56" ...
